parameters.prompt: synthwave, nostalgic, dreamy, melancholic, electric piano, arpeggiated bass, sparse percussion, vintage reverb
parameters.lyrics: [verse] The neon hums a lullaby, a distant echo in the dark / Forgotten faces flicker by like embers fading from a spark [chorus] Were ghosts in the machine, echoes on a screen / Rewind the tape but the pictures never clean [verse] The diner booth still holds your name carved in the vinyl seat / The jukebox plays our song the same but the melodys obsolete [bridge] The city breathes in binary, the streetlights blink and stall / I press my palm against the glass and watch the pixels crawl [outro] The credits roll on empty streets, the night dissolves to blue / I close my eyes and hit delete... but still dream of you
